description: Developer Retro Studios released Donkey Kong Country Tropical Freeze for the Wii U in 2014. Before releasing the final game, Retro Studios released a demo version of the game, which included only the game's first five levels.

This demo version of Tropical Freeze includes RSGFX files. These files contain textures that are associated with names and IDs. They also contain scripts , which the game uses to place and animate these textures within the game's menus and other UI elements.
